name: London Illustration Free Set
description:
Update: An overnight success is ten years in the making. Our elements file got nominated as the best graphic design resource for Figma and I'd love for you to check it out and please vote. â™¥

~ Vincent Le Moign



About London:

London is Streamline's 13th largest illustration set. It is a growing set with 130 illustrations across 19 categories such as Work, Design, Development, Interface and more. New assets are added every month.


About Streamline

For 12 years, Streamline has made the world's largest and most comprehensive icon, illustration and emoji sets. Some of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline. Our app is used by 100,000 creators each month! Even our friends at Figma recommend Streamline :)


Features

  1. Use 130+ London illustrations in Figma via our plugin or via our web app to search faster.
  2. Use the global color editor in our app to change colors at once (HEX, CSS, and RGB).
  3. Precise resizing in our app or free figma plugin. Free users can export all 24,000+ illustrations up to 400 px.


Upcoming sets

Want to sign up for our future sets? 100k people have joined our email list. You can join too -> email list.
